data.name: InvalidContextLines
data.value: invalid number of context lines

data.name: InvalidPackageReference
data.value: invalid package reference syntax

data.name: InvalidRandomSeed
data.value: invalid random seed

data.name: InvalidRegex
data.value: invalid regex: {0}

data.name: InvalidTimeSpan
data.value: invalid time span

data.name: InvalidVerify
data.value: invalid verification mode

data.name: UContextLines
data.value: Show as many lines of context in unified diffs

data.name: UExclude
data.value: Skip tests whose descriptions or names match the given {{PATTERN}}

data.name: UExcludePattern
data.value: Skip tests whose full names match {{REGEX}}

data.name: UFailFast
data.value: Exit when the first test fails

data.name: UFailOnPending
data.value: Exit with an error code if any pending specs

data.name: UFixture
data.value: Include a fixture search {{PATH}}

data.name: UFocus
data.value: Focus tests whose descriptions or names match the given {{PATTERN}}

data.name: UHelp
data.value: Display this help screen

data.name: UInclude
data.value: Run tests whose full names match the given {{PATTERN}}

data.name: UIncludePattern
data.value: Run tests whose full names match {{REGEX}}

data.name: ULoaderOptions
data.value: Loader options

data.name: ULoaderPath
data.value: Add {{PATH}} to loader path

data.name: UNoDiff
data.value: Don't use unified diffs when assertion messages contain long strings

data.name: UNoFocus
data.value: Ignore all focused elements and run everything

data.name: UNoRandomizeSpecs
data.value: Don't randomize specs

data.name: UNoSummary
data.value: Don't show test run summary of failed tests at the end

data.name: UNoWhitespace
data.value: Don't use special characters when printing whitespace in assertion failure messages

data.name: UOutputOptions
data.value: Output options

data.name: UPackage
data.value: Load the NuGet package dependency {{FORMULA}}

data.name: UPause
data.value: Attach tty and wait for a keypress before exiting

data.name: UPlanTimeout
data.value: Specify the maximum {{TIME}} allowed for the test plan to execute

data.name: URandom
data.value: Use the specified {{SEED}} to randomize specs

data.name: URunnerOptions
data.value: Runner options

data.name: USelfTest
data.value: Run the self-tests and exit

data.name: UShowPassExplicit
data.value: Display messages when Assert.Pass is used

data.name: UShowTestNames
data.value: Display names of tests and test cases even on success

data.name: UShowWhitespace
data.value: Use special characters when printing whitespace in assertion failure messages

data.name: UTag
data.value: Run tests with the specified TAG. (Optionally, ~TAG for tests without tag)

data.name: UTestSelectionOptions
data.value: Test selection options

data.name: UTimeout
data.value: Specify the maximum {{TIME}} allowed for any particular test to execute

data.name: UVerify
data.value: Use the specified verification {{MODE}} (either strict or none) to check for errors in tests and assertions

data.name: UVersion
data.value: Report the version information and exit
